comments.body:
I really don't like `CollectionName.fill`. It doesn't make the intent very clear. When I read `Array.fill(base)(new Object)`, to me it looks like the array is filled with the same instance of `Object`.  I really think it is an abuse of by-name parameters. I feel like by-name parameters should really have a "call by need" semantic ðŸ˜„ 

That said, it is my personal opinion and I am happy to change it if you feel strongly about it.
Fair enough. I understand that people don't like it ;) Let's keep `tabulate`, then.
